title: Tarea principal: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
description: Planea un viaje a medellín, Colombia de fin de semana
intro: In planning a weekend trip to Medellín, Colombia, several distinct functional areas can be identified to ensure a comprehensive and well-organized travel plan. The division is based on the key aspects that need to be addressed when planning a trip, such as transportation, accommodation, activities, and budgeting. By breaking down the task into these functional areas, each responsible for a specific aspect of the trip, a detailed travel plan can be efficiently developed.

subtasks.title: Transportation
subtasks.description: Responsible for arranging the transportation to and from Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: A detailed itinerary of flights, trains, or buses.
responsibilities: Research and book flights or other transportation modes.

subtasks.title: Research and book flights to Medellín
subtasks.description: Find suitable flight options to Medellín, compare prices, and make a reservation.
subtasks.expected_output: Booked flight tickets to Medellín.

subtasks.title: Arrange ground transportation in Medellín
subtasks.description: Coordinate transportation options within Medellín, such as booking a taxi or arranging for a rental car.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed ground transportation arrangements in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Research taxi companies in Medellín
subtasks.description: Identify and compare different taxi companies in Medellín based on rates, reviews, and availability.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended taxi companies in Medellín

subtasks.title: Accommodation
subtasks.description: Responsible for securing suitable lodging during the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation of hotel reservations or alternative accommodations.
responsibilities: Research and book a hotel or Airbnb in Medellín.
Ensure the accommodation meets the traveler's preferences and budget.

subtasks.title: Research accommodation options in Medellín
subtasks.description: Research and identify suitable hotels or Airbnbs in Medellín based on preferences and budget.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential accommodation options with details.

subtasks.title: Identify preferred location in Medellín
subtasks.description: Determine the preferred area or neighborhood in Medellín for accommodation.
subtasks.expected_output: Preferred location identified

subtasks.title: Set budget for accommodation
subtasks.description: Establish the budget constraints for the accommodation in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Budget set

subtasks.title: Check availability and make reservations
subtasks.description: Verify availability for chosen accommodation options and make reservations for the selected dates.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed reservations for the chosen accommodation.

subtasks.title: Activities
subtasks.description: Responsible for planning the itinerary and activities during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A schedule of sightseeing, dining, and entertainment options.
responsibilities: Research and plan visits to attractions in Medellín.
Make reservations for tours, restaurants, or events.

subtasks.title: Research tourist attractions in Medellín
subtasks.description: Identify popular sights and activities to visit during the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended tourist attractions in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Compile list of museums in Medellín
subtasks.description: Research and compile a list of museums in Medellín worth visiting.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended museums in Medellín

subtasks.title: Make reservations for guided tours
subtasks.description: Book guided tours to explore specific attractions in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed reservations for guided tours.

subtasks.title: Reserve tables at recommended restaurants
subtasks.description: Secure dining reservations at local restaurants for the weekend trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmed restaurant reservations.

subtasks.title: Check restaurant availability
subtasks.description: Verify the availability of tables at recommended restaurants for the desired date and time.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available time slots at each restaurant

subtasks.title: Make reservation requests
subtasks.description: Submit reservation requests to the selected restaurants based on the available time slots.
subtasks.expected_output: Confirmation numbers for reservation requests

subtasks.title: Budgeting
subtasks.description: Responsible for managing the financial aspects of the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A breakdown of expenses and a budget plan.
responsibilities: Estimate costs for transportation, accommodation, meals, and activities.
Monitor expenses during the trip to stay within the budget.

subtasks.title: Estimate Costs
subtasks.description: Calculate the expected expenses for transportation, accommodation, meals, and activities.
subtasks.expected_output: Estimated budget breakdown.

subtasks.title: Estimate Transportation Costs
subtasks.description: Calculate the expected expenses for transportation.

subtasks.title: Estimate Accommodation Costs
subtasks.description: Calculate the expected expenses for accommodation.

subtasks.title: Estimate Meals and Activities Costs
subtasks.description: Calculate the expected expenses for meals and activities.

subtasks.title: Research Deals and Discounts
subtasks.description: Look for discounts, deals, or special offers on transportation, accommodation, meals, and activities to reduce costs.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential cost-saving options.

subtasks.title: Identify Transportation Discounts
subtasks.description: Look for discounts, deals, or special offers on transportation to reduce costs.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential transportation cost-saving options

subtasks.title: Explore Accommodation Deals
subtasks.description: Look for discounts, deals, or special offers on accommodation to reduce costs.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential accommodation cost-saving options

subtasks.title: Create Budget Plan
subtasks.description: Develop a detailed budget plan outlining the allocated funds for each expense category.
subtasks.expected_output: Comprehensive budget plan.

subtasks.title: Identify Expense Categories
subtasks.description: Break down expenses into distinct categories such as utilities, rent, supplies, etc.
subtasks.expected_output: List of expense categories

subtasks.title: Allocate Funds to Expense Categories
subtasks.description: Determine the amount of funds to allocate to each expense category based on estimated costs and priorities.
subtasks.expected_output: Allocated funds for each expense category

subtasks.title: Packing
subtasks.description: Responsible for ensuring the traveler has all necessary items for the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A packing list tailored to the specific needs of the trip.
responsibilities: Create a checklist of essential items to pack for the weekend trip.
Provide guidance on weather-appropriate clothing and travel essentials.

subtasks.title: Create a packing checklist
subtasks.description: Compile a list of essential items to pack for the weekend trip to Medellín, Colombia.
subtasks.expected_output: Comprehensive packing checklist tailored to the specific needs of the trip.

subtasks.title: Identify clothing items
subtasks.description: Determine the specific clothing items needed for the trip based on the weather forecast and planned activities.
subtasks.expected_output: List of clothing items required for the trip

subtasks.title: Gather toiletries and personal care items
subtasks.description: Compile a list of toiletries and personal care items necessary for the trip, considering travel size restrictions and personal preferences.
subtasks.expected_output: List of toiletries and personal care items to pack

subtasks.title: Check the weather forecast
subtasks.description: Review the weather forecast for Medellín during the weekend trip to determine appropriate clothing and gear.
subtasks.expected_output: Weather-appropriate clothing and gear recommendations based on the forecast.

subtasks.title: Retrieve current weather conditions
subtasks.description: Access the latest weather information for Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Current weather conditions for Medellín

subtasks.title: Research travel essentials
subtasks.description: Identify and list down any specific travel essentials required for the trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of necessary travel essentials for a weekend trip to Medellín.

subtasks.title: Identify clothing requirements
subtasks.description: Determine the type and quantity of clothing needed for the trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of clothing items required for the trip

subtasks.title: Determine toiletry essentials
subtasks.description: Identify the necessary toiletries and personal care items for the trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of toiletry essentials for the trip

subtasks.title: Safety and Health
subtasks.description: Responsible for addressing safety and health considerations during the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Information on travel insurance, emergency contacts, and health precautions.
responsibilities: Arrange travel insurance coverage for the trip.
Provide guidance on health and safety measures in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Arrange Travel Insurance
subtasks.description: Purchase travel insurance coverage for the trip to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: Travel insurance policy documents and coverage details.

subtasks.title: Research Travel Insurance Providers
subtasks.description: Research different travel insurance providers to compare coverage options and prices.
subtasks.expected_output: List of potential travel insurance providers with their coverage details and prices.

subtasks.title: Select Travel Insurance Provider
subtasks.description: Choose the most suitable travel insurance provider based on the research conducted.
subtasks.expected_output: Chosen travel insurance provider and selected coverage plan.

subtasks.title: Research Health Precautions
subtasks.description: Gather information on necessary vaccinations, health advisories, and safety measures for traveling to Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended vaccinations, health tips, and safety precautions.

subtasks.title: Check Required Vaccinations
subtasks.description: Identify the specific vaccinations needed for traveling to Medellín.

subtasks.title: Gather Health Advisories
subtasks.description: Research health advisories specific to Medellín.

subtasks.title: Compile Safety Measures
subtasks.description: Collect safety measures recommended for travelers in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Compile Emergency Contacts
subtasks.description: Create a list of emergency contacts including local emergency services, embassy contacts, and insurance provider's contact information.
subtasks.expected_output: Document with emergency contact numbers and details.

subtasks.title: Identify Local Emergency Services
subtasks.description: Research and list the contact information for local emergency services such as police, fire department, and medical services.
subtasks.expected_output: List of local emergency services contact information

subtasks.title: Gather Embassy Contacts
subtasks.description: Compile a list of embassy contacts for relevant countries in the area.
subtasks.expected_output: List of embassy contacts

subtasks.title: Obtain Insurance Provider's Contact Information
subtasks.description: Retrieve and document the contact information for the insurance provider.
subtasks.expected_output: Insurance provider's contact information

subtasks.title: Communication
subtasks.description: Responsible for ensuring connectivity and communication during the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: Information on SIM cards, Wi-Fi availability, and emergency communication.
responsibilities: Research local SIM card options for mobile phones.
Provide guidance on accessing Wi-Fi and staying connected in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Research Local SIM Card Options
subtasks.description: Identify and compare local SIM card options for mobile phones in Medellín.
subtasks.expected_output: List of available local SIM card providers, their coverage, and pricing.

subtasks.title: Identify Local SIM Card Providers
subtasks.description: Research and list the local SIM card providers available in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Compare Coverage of Local SIM Card Providers
subtasks.description: Compare the coverage areas of each local SIM card provider in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Identify Wi-Fi Hotspots
subtasks.description: Locate and list Wi-Fi hotspots in Medellín for connectivity.
subtasks.expected_output: Compilation of Wi-Fi hotspot locations in Medellín.

subtasks.title: Survey Public Spaces
subtasks.description: Conduct a survey of public spaces in Medellín to identify existing Wi-Fi hotspots.
subtasks.expected_output: List of public spaces with Wi-Fi hotspots
